DzCustomData Class Reference
[Basic Types]

Represents a data class that can be plug-in defined, associated with scene objects, and saved to the native file. More...

Detailed Description

Represents a data class that can be plug-in defined, associated with scene objects, and saved to the native file.

bool  persistent = false

Parameters:
name The name for the data item. This is used to identify the data.
persistent Whether or not the data item should be saved to file.
